revised_title: Magnetic Observations and Inclination in the Atlantic Ocean and Adjoining Coasts
tldr: The author presents a map of magnetic inclination and intensity observations conducted at sea and on land in the Atlantic Ocean and its adjoining coasts. The data was collected by Lieut. Bartholomew James Sullivan and Mr. James Dunlop, and the findings contribute to a better understanding of the Earth's magnetic field and its impact on navigation and oceanography.
